hanzi-su-wiki:
縛

Значения

Связывать, хватать, арестовывать

Мнемоника

Справа — глава 甫 и рука 寸 в значении «действовать». Связывать веревками 糸, арестовывать.

Варианты

缚
purpleculture_pinyin:
fù
to bind; to tie; Taiwan pr. [fu2]
связывать; связать; Тайвань пр. [fu2]
rtega_mnemonic:
縛縛RS
缚缚		tie, truss, arrest, bind, restrain
  • bell 尃 announces the binding with threads 糸: a criminal has been arrested and restrained
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 缚)
Pictophonetic: 尃 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 縛手縛腳 [ fù shǒu fù jiǎo ]: to have too many constraints; to be unable to act freely (idiom)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 尃 [ fū ] to announce, to state
heisig_chinese_memo: Spidey had to bind fast the evil Doctor Octopus using his own metal limbs!
heisig_constituent: truss, thread, spiderman, acupuncturist, specialty, drop, ten, needle, rice field, brains, glue
koohiiStory1: Spidey received good word that the acupuncturist working down the road was actually the evil Doctor Octopus! Spidey headed over to the clinic, and trussed the acupuncturist Doc Oc up using the maniac´s own metal limbs!
koohiiStory2: Because people are so afraid of the procedure, string has to be used by the acunpunturist to truss up his victims, er, patients.
jp_example_words:
束縛(そくばく): restraint, shackles, restriction, confinement, binding
縛る(しばる): tie, bind
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your specialty is dropping people with thread by binding them! You can drop anyone as long as you have enough thread to restrain them. It doesn't matter how much they fight, you'll get them to drop!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine if your specialty was dropping people by binding them with thread. You'd be such a weird person.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you're going to be a weirdo who likes to bind people, at least make sure that they land on their backs (ばく) when they DO drop. Landing on your head or your boobs really hurts. So please at least try to make them land on their backs!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine how you would bind someone so that when they drop they land on their back instead of somewhere more painful. How would you do that?
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), 十 (десять), 寸 (дюйм), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 田 (рисовое поле), 糸 (нить)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a specialist (専) in thread (糸) can bind
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spidey doesn't need a gummed label to seal things with.  A letter can bind fast if he just shoots a web at it.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸" to " special " sound, the original meaning is tied with ropes. "Shuowen": "Shu Ye. Congshi, Shisheng." "Zuo Zhuan‧ Wengong 2nd Year": "Jin Xiang Gong bound Qin prisoners, causing Lai Ju to kill them with Ge."

" Apply " can mean restraint. "Han Feizi·Beini": "A man and a minister belong to his prince, not a relative of flesh and blood. They are bound to the situation and have to do things."

" Tied " said rope tied things. "Zuo Zhuan-Four Years of Zhaogong": "The Prince releases his bondage, accepts his bi, burns his scorpion."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸" to " special " sound, the original meaning is tied with ropes.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「專」聲，本義為用繩索捆綁。《說文》：「束也。从糸，尃聲。」 《左傳‧文公二年》：「晉襄公縛秦囚，使萊駒以戈斬之。」

　　「敷」可表示束縛。《韓非子‧備內》：「人臣之於其君，非有骨肉之親也。縛於勢而不得不事也。」

　　「縛」也表示捆綁東西的繩索。《左傳‧昭公四年》：「王親釋其縛，受其璧，焚其櫬。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「專」聲，本義為用繩索捆綁。

Story: Spidey doesn't need a gummed label to seal things with. A letter can bind fast if he just shoots a web at it.

Lesson: 36 frameNoV4: 1376 frameNoV6: 1476 Strokes: 16 Jouyou Grade: JH JLPT: 1
束縛(そくばく): restraint, shackles, restriction, confinement, binding
縛る(しばる): tie, bind

從「 糸 」，「 專 」聲，本義為用繩索捆綁。《說文》：「束也。从糸，尃聲。」 《左傳‧文公二年》：「晉襄公縛秦囚，使萊駒以戈斬之。」 「 敷 」可表示束縛。《韓非子‧備內》：「人臣之於其君，非有骨肉之親也。縛於勢而不得不事也。」 「 縛 」也表示捆綁東西的繩索。《左傳‧昭公四年》：「王親釋其縛，受其璧，焚其櫬。」
From " 糸" to " special" sound, the original meaning is tied with ropes. "Shuowen": "Shu Ye. Congshi, Shisheng." "Zuo Zhuan‧ Wengong 2nd Year": "Jin Xiang Gong bound Qin prisoners, causing Lai Ju to kill them with Ge." " Apply" can mean restraint. "Han Feizi·Beini": "A man and a minister belong to his prince, not a relative of flesh and blood. They are bound to the situation and have to do things." " Tied" said rope tied things. "Zuo Zhuan-Four Years of Zhaogong": "The Prince releases his bondage, accepts his bi, burns his scorpion."

縛字的基本解释

縛
fù
见“缚”。

縛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》符钁切，入藥，奉。］
［《廣韻》符卧切，去過，奉。］
“缚1”的繁体字。亦作“紨2”。
(1)束；捆绑。
(2)捆绑东西的绳索。
(3)拘束；束缚。
(4)量词。用于捆起来的东西。

縛字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　縛； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页934第10
【廣韻】符钁切【集韻】【韻會】伏約切【正韻】符約切【說文】束也。【釋名】縛，薄也。使相薄著也。【廣韻】繫也。【左傳·僖六年】許男面縛銜璧。又【昭二十六年】以幣錦二兩，縛一如瑱。【註】縛，卷也。　又【釋名】縛在車下，與輿相連縛也。【急就篇註】縛在車下，主縛軸令輿相連，卽今所謂鉤心也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?符臥切。義同。　又【集韻】符遇切，音附。紨或作縛。繩也。【韻會】俗从專作縳，誤。

考證：〔【釋名】縛，薄也。使相薄者也。〕　謹照原文薄者改薄著。

fù
вм. 缚
Radicals: 糸, 専, 丶  (thread, specialty, drop)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your specialty is dropping people with thread by binding them! You can drop anyone as long as you have enough thread to restrain them. It doesn't matter how much they fight, you'll get them to drop!
Imagine if your specialty was dropping people by binding them with thread. You'd be such a weird person.
Reading Mnemonic
If you're going to be a weirdo who likes to bind people, at least make sure that they land on their backs (ばく) when they DO drop. Landing on your head or your boobs really hurts. So please at least try to make them land on their backs!
Imagine how you would bind someone so that when they drop they land on their back instead of somewhere more painful. How would you do that?
